The cool October weather is the perfect excuse to tastetest local beers in Indiana at the second Spirits Along the Hoodlebug event which will be held from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD Saturday PERIOD

The Hoodlebug Trail is a 10mile recreation and commuter trail running from Black Lick to Indiana PERIOD The trail passes right by Disobedient Spirits PERIOD

The event celebrates the fiftieth anniversary of the Indiana County Parks and Trails Disobedient Spirits Levity Brewing Co PERIOD and Noble Stein Brewing Co PERIOD

Last year the three breweries donated a combined  to Indiana County Parks and Trails to assist with the maintenance of the Hoodlebug Trail PERIOD Each business sold one specialty product to help raise the funds PERIOD

Last year Levity sold Hoodlebug Brown Ale PERIOD Disobedient Spirits sold Hoodlebug Gin PERIOD Noble Stein sold Stoney Run Ale a tribute to a stream that runs along the Hoodlebug Trail PERIOD

Beginning at  a.m PERIOD at Levity at  Wayne Ave. attendees are scheduled to sample IPAs and ales PERIOD A shuttle bus will then take attendees to Noble Stein PERIOD

Levity Indianas first brewery brews the bestselling beer the Hoodlebug Brown. levity donates a portion of daily sales from the beer to trail maintenance PERIOD

With  years of collective brewing experience the owners of Noble Stein decided to start the company with the intent of bringing Indiana the beer they deserve according to Noble Steins website PERIOD

After attendees tastetest the craft beers offered at both breweries the shuttle takes them to the Hoodlebug Trail to walk the trail with a local botanist to Homer Citys Disobedient Spirits PERIOD

The botonist will give a lectureabout the evolution of the trail and the history of the animals and plants that inhabit it PERIOD At  p.m. the shuttle bus will bring participants back to Levity PERIOD

Registering for the event can be done online at

www.disobedientspirits.comhoodlebug or by visiting the Indiana County Tourist Bureau PERIOD The cost for the event is  per person which includes the bus ride and a sample at each location PERIOD All participants must be at least  years old for alcoholic beverages PERIOD
